header.rec_loc: Car, Between Motovun and Pula, Istria, Croatia

header.topics: Family injuries, Celebrities, Newspapers, Beaches, Petrol, Milk, Cameras, Parking, Children, Insect bites, Food, Animals, Driving, Movies
header.activity: Family discussion during a car journey

so we can spend the day in Pula then
evening watch the sun set from the church terrace in the nearby hill town of Groznjan
